sentences.en: As far as I'm concerned, the beige one is better.
sentences.cn: 就我而言, 米色的那个更好.

sentences.en: Beyond that, through another open door, was a large bed made up like the ones in the hotel—a beige comforter, lots of pillows arranged upright against the headboard.
sentences.cn: 除此之外，透过另一扇开着的门，可以看到像是饭店房间里的大床——铺着米黄色的被子，床头板上竖直靠着许多枕头。

sentences.en: Crown variegated dark green, yellow and beige, plain. Miniature.
sentences.cn: 深绿色, 黄色和灰褐色组合成的皇冠斑叶, 一般型叶. 迷你型.

sentences.en: I studied the figured pattern on the beige rug.
sentences.cn: 我细看着米色地毯上的花纹.

sentences.en: I want beige pants to match my sky blue T shirt.
sentences.cn: 我要米色的裤子来配我的天蓝色T恤衫.

sentences.en: She decided on a beige cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 她决定穿一件米色羊绒毛衣.

sentences.en: She wore a tan silk shirt and a tight beige skirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一件浅黄褐色的丝绸衬衫和一条米色的紧身裙子.
一些浅色的, 灰色或米黄.

sentences.en: The green one looks nice, so does the beige one.
sentences.cn: 这件绿色的看上去很好, 米色的也不错.

sentences.en: The most popular colours appeared to be “white, ” “black” and “beige”.
sentences.cn: “白色”、“黑色”和“米色”是出现频率最高的颜色。

sentences.en: The President sat up straight in his chair, a piece of beige plastic in his ear.
sentences.cn: 总统直挺挺地坐在椅子上, 一只耳朵塞着一块米色的塑料.

sentences.en: The students merely counted the number of black and beige raincoats.
sentences.cn: 这些学生只是数数色和米色风衣的数量.

sentences.en: The walls have been done in beige.
They were small, somewhere between ecru and beige, but this was it.
sentences.cn: 它们很小, 淡褐色的, 但毕竟是不错的.

sentences.en: This crystal full of rice, were like semi - transparent, beige micro - brown.
sentences.cn: 这种大米晶莹饱满, 呈半透明状, 米色微褐.

sentences.en: This short zippered ski jacket invigorates a beige look underneath.
sentences.cn: 这件带拉锁的短滑雪衫突出了米黄色的长裤的活力.

sentences.en: We're also using silk and some very strong cotton and trying out new prints, but keeping the colors I love ─ blacks, grays and beige.
sentences.cn: 我们还选用了丝绸和很有韧性的棉布，尝试新的图案，但同时保留我喜欢的颜色──黑色、灰色和米黄色。

phrases.tran_cn: 褐皮书；黄皮书（由美国联邦储备委员会公布的经济报告）
